nodes.text: Amonos was a Duros male lieutenant in the Republic Army who served during the Galactic War between the reconstituted Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. Following the Battle of Corellia, Amonos was among the Republic forces that remained on the planet Corellia to secure the Black Hole refinery region, and was stationed at Sentinel Outpost.

Lieutenant Amonos appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Classic Gear Vendor for the Republic faction in the Black Hole Daily Area, which was added in Game Update 1.2: Legacy on April 12, 2012.
